dialogue: A Bee Tip: If you you're struggling to hold up or down while moving, or wall jumping. Try binding [color=yellow]alternate buttons[/color] to up and down!
For example: On Controller by default ZL is bound to up, and ZR is bound to down, that way you can slide jump by just holding forward pressing ZR and jumping!
Instead of hunting for the perfect diagonal to hug the wall, just hold into the wall and walljump while holding ZL!!
This is less useful for the keyboard kreachers among us, but essential for upward walljumps on controller!
